content.text: I read a lot and I'm a bit of a history buff.
I like reading too. What kinds of books do you like?
I like history books, but I've also been reading a lot of sci-fi lately.
I used to read a lot of sci-fi, but I haven't read much lately. What are some good sci-fi books you've read recently?
I just finished the Three Body Problem trilogy and I really enjoyed it.
I've heard good things about that series. I've also heard good things about the Expanse series.
I've heard of that one too, but I haven't read it yet.
I'm not sure what I'm going to read next. Maybe I'll check out the Expanse series.
That's a good choice. I've heard good things about it.
I'm going to go now. It was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too. Have a good day.
